content: this cute drawstring bag features a modified crocodile stitch consisting of a few basic stitches gauge is not important so feel free to use any weight of yarn and size of hook that you prefer my example bag uses loops & threads flecks yarn category 4 and a 4 5 mm hook and the resulting bag is about the size of a grapefruit these bags are versatile and can be used to store gaming dice coins collectibles whatever you desire i hope you have fun making this and i can t wait to see your creations
